unnormalised: Okay, so someone asked about how to write a proper Indian address, right? It can seem a bit confusing compared to, say, addresses you see in American movies. Don't sweat it, bhai! Here’s the deal.
normalised: Okay, so someone asked about how to write a proper Indian address, right? It can seem a bit confusing compared to, say, addresses you see in American movies. Don't sweat it, bhai! Here's the deal.

unnormalised: First off, think about the smallest unit and work your way up. Start with your house number or flat number – something like "Flat No. 101" or "House No. 25". If it's an independent house, you might also include the building name or the area, like "Near D-Mart". Important: write it clearly! After that, comes the street name, something like “MG Road” or “Linking Road”. Then comes your locality, like "Bandra (W)" or "Indiranagar".
normalised: First off, think about the smallest unit and work your way up. Start with your house number or flat number – something like "Flat Number one hundred and one" or "House Number twenty five". If it's an independent house, you might also include the building name or the area, like "Near D-Mart". Important: write it clearly! After that, comes the street name, something like "M-G Road" or "Linking Road". Then comes your locality, like "Bandra (W)" or "Indiranagar".

unnormalised: Next, you put in your city, like “Mumbai” or “Bengaluru” or "Guwahati". Don't forget to add the state, such as “Maharashtra” or "Assam." See, not so tough, eh?
normalised: Next, you put in your city, like "Mumbai" or "Bengaluru" or "Guwahati". Don't forget to add the state, such as "Maharashtra" or "Assam." See, not so tough, eh?

unnormalised: Finally, and this is super important, include the PIN code! This is a 6-digit number (like 400050 or 781001) that helps the postal service sort everything out. Without it, your package might end up in the wrong place! So, a complete address might look something like this: Flat 2B, Sarvodaya Apartments, Linking Road, Bandra (W), Mumbai, Maharashtra, 400050. All set, ji? Now you can confidently receive all those online shopping deliveries!
